title: VueDo
description: Todo list app made in Vue.js as part of the IADT CCY3 frontend frameworks module.

title: Vue-Giph
description: Connecting to the Giphy API to provide a frontend offering search, random, and trending gifs.

title: PHP Shopping Site
description: Shopping Cart Application with CRUD, Search/Sort, basket, related products, email with PHPMailer, and Stripe-integrated checkout.

title: P5 Ball Game
description: A simple HTML5 game made with p5.js, mobile version including movement using accelerometer

title: Flutter Cocktail Search
description: Flutter/Dart application using cocktaildb API to allow search of any cocktail ingredient to view a list of possible cocktails.

title: Android Cocktail Search
description: Written in kotlin, designed to MVVM architecture. API calls using Retrofit, local SQLite database. Search for a cocktail for a list of possibilities.

title: Vue Countries
description: Vue application connecting to countries, events, news, food, maps, time, and placename APIs to provide detailed information on the countries of the world.

title: Vue Courses
description: Vue CRUD application allowing users to view and manipulate data about courses, lecturers and enrolments at a college. Authentication and data access is provided by a REST API. Application also incorporates Vuex for state management and the Vuetify design framework.
